Tips for Choosing the Right Size and Placement for High-Rise Signs

Selecting the perfect size and placement for your high-rise sign maximizes visibility and impact. Here are some expert tips to help you make the right choice:

  1. Consider viewing distance: The size of your sign should be proportional to the distance from which it will typically be viewed. This often means going big to ensure readability from afar for high-rise signs.
  2. Analyze surrounding buildings: Consider the height and proximity of neighboring structures to determine the optimal placement for maximum visibility.
  3. Understand local regulations: Familiarize yourself with Houston’s signage ordinances to ensure your high-rise sign complies with size and placement restrictions.
  4. Balance aesthetics and functionality: Your sign should complement your building’s architecture and be easily readable and recognizable.
  5. Leverage natural sightlines: Position your sign where it can be seen from major roads, highways, or other high-traffic areas.
  6. Account for lighting conditions: Consider how sunlight and shadows may affect your sign’s visibility throughout the day, and choose a placement that maximizes visibility in various lighting conditions.
  7. Think about future growth: If you plan to expand your business or rebrand, choose a size and placement that can accommodate potential changes.

By considering these factors, you’ll be well on your way to creating a high-rise sign that effectively promotes your brand and stands out in the Houston skyline. Our team at Royal Signs & Awnings is here to guide you through this process and ensure your high-rise sign makes the impact you desire.

The Importance of Regular Maintenance

 

Your high-rise sign is more than just a beacon for your business—it’s an investment in your brand’s visibility and reputation. Regular maintenance is crucial to protecting this investment and ensuring your sign continues to make a lasting impression.

Here’s why ongoing care for your high-rise sign matters:

  • Longevity: Regular upkeep extends the life of your sign, saving you money in the long run.
  • Safety: Routine inspections help identify and address potential hazards before they become serious issues.
  • Appearance: A well-maintained sign always looks its best, reflecting positively on your brand.
  • Performance: For illuminated or digital signs, regular maintenance ensures optimal functionality.
  • Compliance: Stay up-to-date with local regulations and avoid potential fines.

At Royal Signs & Awnings, we offer comprehensive maintenance plans tailored to your high-rise sign. Our expert team will keep your sign looking sharp and functioning flawlessly, no matter the weather or wear and tear. Don’t let your high-rise investment fade—let us help you keep it shining bright in the Houston skyline.

Weather-Resistant Features for Houston’s Climate

Houston’s unique climate presents specific challenges for high-rise signs. Our signs are engineered with cutting-edge weather-resistant features to ensure longevity and performance:

  • UV-Resistant Materials: We use specially treated materials that resist fading and degradation from Houston’s intense sunlight.
  • Corrosion-Resistant Metals: Our signs withstand humidity and salt air, preventing rust and maintaining structural integrity.
  • Water-Tight Seals: Advanced sealants protect internal components from moisture during heavy rains and high humidity.
  • Wind-Resistant Design: Engineered to withstand high winds, our signs remain secure during storms and hurricanes.
  • Temperature-Tolerant Components: Materials and electronics are chosen to perform reliably in Houston’s heat and occasional cold snaps.

These weather-resistant features protect your investment and reduce the frequency of repairs, ensuring your high-rise sign remains a beacon for your business year-round.
